webcams.name: Logitech - C930e Full HD 1080p Business Webcam - Black

features.feature:
Delivers professional video-conferencing experience
HD 1080p/30 fps video enhanced by RightLight 2 and a high-precision lens deliver rich video quality along with the premium image sensor.

Wide field of view with 4x zoom
With a generous 90° diagonal field of view, HD autofocus, pan, tilt, and 4x HD zoom, C930e  frames you and your workspace perfectly with the highest level of detail.

Noise-cancelling dual mics
Features dual integrated omnidirectional mics that capture audio clearly from up to one meter away so conversations always sound natural and clear.

High quality, low bandwidth
Supports H.264 with Scalable Video Coding (SVC) and UVC 1.5 encoding to minimize dependence on computer and network resources to produce remarkably clear video at all times.

Take control with Logi Tune app
The Logi Tune Desktop app simplifies personal device control with zoom in/out, color presets, color adjustments, set manual focus, and easy firmware updates.

Certified for Business
Certified for Skype for Business and Microsoft Teams. Certifications and compatibility with other popular applications include Google Meet, Zoom and more.

Versatile mounting options
Securely mount C930e wherever it works best—laptop, display or tabletop—with the adjustable clip or affix to your own tripod with the integrated thread.

Attachable privacy shade
A flippable lens shade is included with C930e to protect the lens and assure privacy and peace of mind when the webcam is not in use.

webcams.name: Logitech - ConferenceCam Connect 1080p Video Conferencing Camera for Business - Black

features.feature:
Portable all-in-one design
Sleek, easy to carry and a snap to set up and use to expand the collaborative potential of the Anywhere Workplace.

Optimised for small workgroups
Optimized for teams of 1-6, experience HD 1080p video and 360-degree sound in virtually any workspace—and watch productivity soar.

Multi-device connectivity
Simply connect a PC or Mac to conduct lifelike meetings within the user’s familiar computing environment or use the convenience of wireless connectivity for screen mirroring and audio pairing from a compatible mobile device. Compatible with Android and Windows 8.1 – see specifications for requirements.

Interact with everyone at the table
The 90-degree field of view with digital pan, tilt and the 4X digital zoom in Full HD is ideal for small group meetings.

Hear and be heard
The acoustics are tuned to provide a quality experience so that users can hear and be heard within a 3.6-metre (12-foot) diameter range.

webcams.name: Logitech - C930s Pro HD 1080 Webcam for Laptops with Ultra Wide Angle - Black

features.feature:
Look flawless with 1080p HD
The high-precision lens and premium image sensor in the C930s Pro HD Webcam autofocuses on you to deliver crystal-clear HD video calls, for Zoom meetings and conferencing.

Auto light adjustment
RightLight 2 technology compensates for less-than-optimal lighting, including low light and backlighting, to help you shine on camera.

Frame yourself
With a wide-angle field of view of 90 degrees, 4x HD zoom, pan, and tilt, you can zoom in or out to focus on yourself, bring in the background, or direct attention to a specific object.

Sound clear to others
Dual microphones capture your voice clearly from up to 3.3 ft (1 m) away so your conversation is natural and easy to hear via the external webcam for laptops and computers.

Up to 60 frames per second
Record in 1080p/30fps or 720p/60fps. C930s HD Webcam delivers smooth and vivid video recordings, optimal for any situation that requires slow motion or an extra-smooth and fluid video stream.

Personalize the video experience
Logi Tune or G HUB software help you customize the features of C930s computer video camera, whether you’re meeting virtually, streaming, or recording.

Privacy shade
Flip the privacy shutter up or and down to expose or cover the camera lens.

Compatibility
Works with Windows, Mac, and ChromeOS as well as popular calling and streaming platforms including Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Skype, Google Voice and more.

More sustainable
Certified carbon neutral: the carbon impact of the product and packaging has been reduced to zero.

monitors.name: Samsung - Odyssey CRG9 49" Curved Dual QHD FreeSync and G-Sync Gaming Monitor (DisplayPort, HDMI, USB) - Black

features.feature:
Dual QHD Display
The CRG9’s 5120 x 1440 Dual QHD resolution provides a super ultra-wide aspect ratio that lets you view more content in superfine detail. With screen space equivalent to two 27-inch QHD displays side by side, the 49-inch curved monitor delivers a wider view for winning play.

Super Ultra-Wide Curve
With a Super Ultra-Wide 32:9 ratio, the CRG9 curves around your field of view to immerse you in all the onscreen gaming action.

HDR1000 and QLED
HDR1000 supports a peak brightness rating of 1,000 nits for true high dynamic range (HDR content). And with Samsung QLED technology delivering DCI-P3 95%, colors are purer, brighter and truer to life than ever.

AMD FreeSync Premium Pro
Based on the adaptive sync technology of the original AMD FreeSync Technology to reduce stutter and screen tearing.
FreeSync Premium Pro include support for HDR content display, reduced input latency, and Low Framerate Compensation (LFC) for effortlessly smooth gameplay.

120 Hz Refresh Rate
The rapid 120 Hz screen refresh rate minimizes image lag and motion blur for smoother gaming. The user-friendly 60 Hz settings let you quickly optimize performance via the on-screen display without having to access the display setting menu.

Play to Win
The game-optimized monitor is designed to let you play to win.

Turn on Game Mode to instantly adjust contrast and color settings for any game genre, switch to Low Input Lag Mode for even faster response times, and target your enemies more accurately with Virtual Aim Point onscreen crosshairs.

Picture-by-Picture
With Picture-by-Picture you can connect and view input sources without degrading the original image quality. Picture-by-Picture offers convenience for PC games. For example, you can watch a movie and do a web search whilst playing your favorite game.

Eye Comfort
Eye Saver Mode reduces fatigue-inducing blue light emissions and Flicker Free technology suppresses distracting screen flicker, letting you play for longer with less eye strain.

Optimized Viewing
The swivel/tilt and height-adjustable stand offers all the flexibility you need to position the screen for maximum comfort. The panel’s VESA Standard mount also offers the option of mounting on VESA-compatible arms.

NVIDIA G-SYNC synchronizes the refresh rates between the GPU and display, eliminating screen tearing and minimizing display stutter and input lag.

Allow you to set up DVD players and other AV sources for a clear, high quality audio and video signal.

2 USB 3.0 ports
Allow you to connect devices to the monitor, which then transfers the data to the computer.

178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles
Allow you to view the screen from a wide range of angles.

1,000:1 contrast ratio
Ensures images are crisp and clear with deep blacks and bright highlights.

450 cd/m² brightness
Produces bright images that can clearly be seen even in well-lit rooms.

monitors.name: AOC - G2 Series C27G2 27" LED Curved FHD FreeSync Premium Monitor (DisplayPort, HDMI, VGA) - Black/Red

features.feature:
27” size with Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution
27” large Full HD resolution panel delivers sharp video and imagery, suitable for watching videos, work, and general computing.

Immersive gaming with curved panel
The VA panel features a 1500R (1500mm radius) curvature to provide a more immersive viewing experience as the edges of the screen

Up to 165Hz refresh rate
Enjoy fast frame transitions and avoid stutter with the incredibly high refresh rate when connected via HDMI 2.0 or DisplayPort 1.2 inputs. Supports refresh rate from 48 Hz to 165 Hz.

1ms response time (MPRT)
Avoid blurring during fast-action movements with the ultra-fast response time.

AMD FreeSync Premium certified
Certified to equip serious gamers with high refresh rate and low framerate compensation (LFC) for fluid and tear-free gaming at peak performance.

119.9% sRGB & 88.4% DCI-P3 color gamut area coverage
Wide color gamut produces an incredible reproduction of images and videos with more true-to-life colors, important for photo editing and other color-critical tasks.

Low input lag mode
Enable Low Input Lag mode to reduce the lag and image processing time so that your reaction time is as closely reflected on-screen as possible, giving you an edge over your opponents.

Game Shadow for better visibility
AOC Game Shadow settings allow for tuning of the display with quick profiles so that the dark areas of the gameplay are boosted for more contrast without affecting other parts of the image. Enemies and important details are now easier to spot with AOC Game Shadow.

HDMI, DisplayPort, and VGA inputs
Achieve sharper images and better performance with digital inputs that support up to 165Hz refresh rates. 2x HDMI 2.0a (HDCP 1.4), 1x DisplayPort 1.2 (HDCP 1.4), and 1x VGA port are available.

Height, swivel, and tilt adjustable stand
The included stand is height, swivel, and tilt adjustable so it can be positioned in a position to promote better sitting postures, reducing fatigue over a long usage period. The stand is equipped with a quick-release button for easy attachment and removal.

VESA mounting compatible
The VESA mounting holes allow for flexible mounting options should you choose to mount it with 3rd party mounts for a more ergonomic or multi-monitor setup.

80,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio (3,000:1 typical)
80,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio ensures images are crisp and clear with deep blacks and bright highlights.

250 cd/m² brightness
The high 250 cd/m² (or 250 nits) brightness achieved by W-LED backlight ensures good visibility on the display even in brightly lit rooms.

monitors.name: Samsung - T55 Series 27" LED 1000R Curved FHD FreeSync Monitor with Speakers (DisplayPort, HDMI, VGA) - Black

features.feature:
Optimum curvature
Introducing the boldest curve ever accomplished. This milestone, born from years of relentless innovation, changes the shape of visual display and pioneers the future of monitor technology.

1000R and eye comfort certification
T55 received a high performance curved display (1000R) and eye comfort certificate for its superior 1000R curved display from TÜV Rheinland; a leading international Testing , Inspection, and Certification body.

Ready to entertain
Connect to all your favorite devices with a convenient HDMI, DP, and D-Sub triple interface. The built-in 5 Watt speakers make it even easier to get lost in your favorite movies or TV shows, without plugging in a speaker.

The curve champion
The leader in curved monitors. Samsung has led the curved monitor market since being the first to introduce the innovative displays to the world in 2015. With industry-leading technology in a full line-up, Samsung's curved monitors are consistently number one in market share.

Easy on the eyes
In comparison to conventional monitors that have less curve, 1000R closely fits the human field of view for less eye strain. The whole screen can be seen in just one glance to limit visual fatigue, even during sustained use.

Minimalist design
Next-generation design. The virtually borderless display's striking aesthetic is enhanced by a fabric-textured backside and premium-quality slim metal stand. The result is a monitor that won't just catch eyes, but complements any interior, too.

What gamers want
Welcome to your new playground. AMD FreeSync delivers seamless gaming, while 75Hz makes scenes smooth. This flawless imagery comes together with Game Mode and the renowned 1000R curve for intensely realistic immersion.

Focused comfort
Protect your eyes and do more. The T55's advanced eye comfort technology reduces eye strain for more comfortable extended computing. Flicker Free technology continuously removes tiring and irritating screen flicker

* 'R' is an acronym representing circular radius. The smaller the 'R' value, the deeper the curve. Eye comfort certificate only applies to 24-inch and 27-inch monitors. Based on data from IDC Quarterly PC Monitor Tracker 2019, Q3
